ygData.subject: DARPA Grand Challenge
ygData.msgSnippet: Has anyone been following the DARPA Grand Challenge? http://www.tomshardware.com/game/20040312/index.htm http://www.grandchallenge.org/ Makes me wonder what

Has anyone been following the DARPA Grand Challenge?

http://www.tomshardware.com/game/20040312/index.htm
http://www.grandchallenge.org/

Makes me wonder what sort of control software was being used. In the 
article at Toms hardware there was mention that some of the vehcles 
suffered from very basic problems such as stalling on the startline. 
Surely an NN with inputs from a rev counter & throttle position could 
easily have solved that particular problem, not to mention some of the 
bigger problems such as overall vehicle control and navigation.

Colin.
